content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Mr. Wang. I'm glad to have you here. Let's discuss the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the prime location of this newly built apartment in the city center with easy access to essential facilities, I hope to land a reasonable deal. Initially proposing a rental price of 850 Euros per month, I'm open to negotiation and willing to compromise. What is your suggested price counteroffer, sir?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we should focus on the rental price. Please stick to discussing the rental price only.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Apologies for the earlier deviation. Now solely focusing on the rental price discussion, I maintain my opening offer of renting at 850 Euros monthly. Your turn to provide a counteroffer, sir.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I need to make a counteroffer. Here's my counteroffer: 1000 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing your counterproposal, but I find it slightly higher than my initial offer. Let me consider this new number and come back with another response.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While acknowledging the importance of meeting halfway, I must emphasize the well-maintained and highly desirable nature of this urban apartment. Thus, I must gently decline your latest offer of 1000 Euros, seeking a more balanced compromise around 925 Euros per month. Let us continue our negotiation in this direction.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Appreciating your willingness to meet nearer to my initial stance, I find the suggested rental price of 925 Euros marginally lower than my preferred range, but a feasible compromise. I agree to the price of 925 Euros for renting this excellent apartment in the city center. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
